title: A new enterlude called Thersytes thys enterlude folowynge dothe declare howe that the greatest boesters are not the greatest doers. The names of the players Thersites a boster. Mulciber a smyth. Mater a mother. Miles a knyght. Telemachus a childe.
author: Ravisius Textor, Joannes, ca. 1480-1524.
publisher: By Iohn Tysdale and are to be solde at hys shop in the vpper ende of Lombard strete, in Alhallowes churche yarde neare vntoo grace church,
